name: The Jackbox Party Pack
description: The team behind YOU DON’T KNOW JACK presents FIVE guffaw-inducing party games in one pack! You’re gonna need more than one party for this. Your phones or tablets are your controllers! For 1-100 players!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 650 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
